title: Commission Regulation (EEC) No 3698/92 of 21 December 1992 amending Regulation (EEC) No 3846/87 establishing an agricultural products nomenclature for export refunds
header:
COMMISSION REGULATION (EEC) No 3698/92  of 21 December 1992  amending Regulation (EEC) No 3846/87 establishing an agricultural products nomenclature for export refunds
THE COMMISSION OF THE EUROPEAN COMMUNITIES
main_body: The data relating to CN codes 1001 10, 1003, 1004 00 and 1103 11 10 of the agricultural product nomenclature for export refunds given in sector 1 of the Annex to Regulation (EEC) No 3846/87 are hereby replaced by that listed in the Annex  hereto.
This Regulation shall enter into force on 1 January 1993. This Regulation shall be binding in its entirety and directly applicable in all Member States.
attachments:
Done at Brussels, 21 December 1992. For the Commission
Ray MAC SHARRY
Member of the Commission
(1) OJ No L 281, 1. 11. 1975, p. 1. (2) OJ No L 180, 1. 7. 1992, p. 1. (3) OJ No L 267, 14. 9. 1992, p. 1. (4) OJ No L 366, 24. 12. 1987, p. 1. (5) OJ No L 327, 13. 11. 1992, p. 34.
